main event: An oval shaped object with a fluorescent glow was reported hovering in the sky, making a right angle turn before disappearing.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright and intense light., The sighting occurred in November 1957., The object was seen for several minutes before departing., Witness described the object as clear and pale yellow, moving into a cloud bank., Comments on some sightings suggested they could be balloons or meteors.
witness description: Civilian, female, age 38, works as a housewife
